underlying_goal: To make the prompting in claude/CLAUDE.md stronger to encourage the model to default to using "plan mode" for non-trivial tasks.
friction_detail: Claude ironically got stuck in plan mode while trying to perform a simple text replacement to strengthen plan mode guidance, requiring user feedback to proceed.
primary_success: After refining the verbosity with the user, Claude successfully added concise and effective guidance to the CLAUDE.md file in three separate locations to reinforce the "plan-first" behavior.
brief_summary: The user wanted to strengthen the "plan-first" guidance in the main CLAUDE.md file. After an initial proposal that was too verbose, and a moment of irony where Claude got stuck in plan mode, a concise set of instructions was agreed upon. Claude then successfully edited the file in three places to reinforce this behavior.
